info.description: API for managing tmux sessions and windows
info.title: tmux-client API

post.description: Queries the audit log for entries

get.description: Retrieves the list of allowed and denied commands

post.description: Executes a shell command
Copies a file from source to destination
Deletes a file or directory
Edits the content of a file
Checks if a file or directory exists
Computes the SHA256 hash of a file
Lists the contents of a directory
Reads the content of a file
Writes content to a file

get.description: Retrieves the health status of the API server and its components

post.description: Requests approval from a human for an action
Requests approval from a human asynchronously

get.description: Lists all pending human approval requests
Retrieves a specific pending approval request

post.description: Responds to a pending approval request
Creates a new execution plan
Updates an execution plan
Aborts an execution plan
Advances to the next step in a plan

get.description: Get a list of panes in a tmux session

post.description: Creates a new tmux pane
Reads the content of a tmux pane
Sends keystrokes to a tmux pane
Switches to a specific tmux pane

get.description: Get a list of all active tmux sessions

post.description: Creates a new tmux session
Releases (kills) a tmux session by ID

get.description: Get a list of windows in a tmux session

new_window.description: true = create new window instead of split

overwrite.description: Must be true to overwrite existing

created.description: true if file was created, false if overwritten
